official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in the Placer County, California to Mrs. Edna C. Marshall, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in the Placer County, California to Mrs. Edna C. Marshall.
